summary: A man and woman fall in love but lie about who they really are due to their mutual insecurities.
cast: Francisco Solorzano|Patrizia Hernandez|Israel Horovitz|Caitlin FitzGerald|John Harlacher|Matt Bernhard|Denise Blasor|Moreno Brown|Elizabeth Halbert|Robby Scott Holt|Robert Holt|Betty Hudson|Jenny Kirlin|Ray Lindie|Michael Radoja|Malik Shoaib|Ashton Swinford|Will Tung
title: Love Simple
